body: hello if u want to join this club post a message. i am the leader we will battle on walls or nebula together must ask me to join and mus have fun! leave a comet and do /where maughana to find me and join the club!!

title: Join the club Knights!!!

replies.body: Please don't use the forums for this, instead use Skype, for keeping spam topics at a minimum.
